summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Friday 28 January to end of Friday 28 January GMT
description: Friday, mostly bright and sunny with occasional fog patches in the morning. Turning cloudy with outbreaks of light rain overnight.<br/><br/>Breezy with a relatively' clean' westerly airflow. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
